name: UPoseAsset
doc: Pose Asset that can be blended by weight of curves

bAdditivePose: Whether or not Additive Pose or not - these are property that needs post process, so
RetargetSource: Base pose to use when retargeting
RetargetSourceAsset: If RetargetSource is set to Default (None), this is asset for the base pose to use when retargeting. Transform data will be saved in RetargetSourceAssetReferencePose.

methods.name: GetBasePoseName
methods.doc: Returns base pose name, only valid when additive, NAME_None indicates reference pose

methods.name: GetPoseNames
methods.doc: Returns the name of all contained poses

methods.name: SetBasePoseName
methods.doc: Set base pose index by name, NAME_None indicates reference pose - returns true if set successfully

methods.name: UpdatePoseFromAnimation
methods.doc: Contained poses are re-generated from the provided Animation Sequence
